Job Opportunity for local candidate!Vacancy: ğŸ”¹ Senior Quality Assurance Engineer* 2 headcounts availableWorking location: Kuala LumpurSenior Quality Assurance Engineer Key Responsibilities:1. Test Strategy & Planning:- Develop comprehensive test plans and strategies covering both manual and automated testing approaches.- Collaborate with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to define testing requirements and priorities.2. Automation Testing:- Design, develop, and maintain robust automation frameworks using industry-standard tools (e.g., Selenium, Appium, or similar).- Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines to ensure continuous quality and fast feedback.3. Manual Testing:- Execute detailed manual testing processes, including functional, regression, and exploratory testing.- Identify, document, and manage defects; perform root-cause analysis to ensure issues are resolved in a timely manner.4. Team Leadership & Training:- Monitor daily QA activities and provide guidance to junior testers.- Develop training materials and conduct regular training sessions to enhance team capabilities in both manual and automated testing practices.- Act as a mentor, sharing expertise and best practices to build a high-performing QA team.5. Continuous Improvement:- Stay updated on emerging trends and tools in test automation and manual testing.- Evaluate and recommend new testing tools and techniques to improve efficiency and effectiveness.- Collaborate in cross-functional teams to implement process improvements and quality enhancements.Requirements:* Minimum 8 years of experience in handling projects and with exposure to the full system development life cycle. Manual & automated testing for web, mobile & requirement testing would be advantageous.* Preferably with insurance knowledge/background.* Candidate with any programming or scripting knowledge will be an added advantage.* Possess at least a Degree in IT or equivalent.* Salary : RM10,000 - RM12,000* Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 8:30 AM to 5:30 PM* Hybrid Working Mode* Benefits: 18 days AL, Annual Performance Bonus, Company Activities Events, Team Building and TrainingHow to Apply: Email your CV to me at rashidah.rashid@perkeso.gov.myhashtag#vacancyhashtag#myfuturejobshashtag#petronashashtag#expetronashashtag#hiringhashtag#newhiringhashtag#currenthiringhashtag#urgenthiringhashtag#SeniorQualityAssuranceEngineerhashtag#jawatankosonghashtag#kekosonganjawatanhashtag#seniorengineer

Job Opportunity for local candidate!Vacancy: ğŸ”¹ Senior Quality Assurance Engineer* 2 headcounts availableWorking location: Kuala LumpurSenior Quality Assurance Engineer Key Responsibilities:1. Test Strategy & Planning:- Develop comprehensive test plans and strategies covering both manual and automated testing approaches.- Collaborate with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to define testing requirements and priorities.2. Automation Testing:- Design, develop, and maintain robust automation frameworks using industry-standard tools (e.g., Selenium, Appium, or similar).- Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines to ensure continuous quality and fast feedback.3. Continuous Improvement:- Stay updated on emerging trends and tools in test automation and manual testing.- Evaluate and recommend new testing tools and techniques to improve efficiency and effectiveness.- Collaborate in cross-functional teams to implement process improvements and quality enhancements.Requirements:* Minimum 8 years of experience in handling projects and with exposure to the full system development life cycle. Username: Nuur Rashidah Abdul RashidNuur Rashidah Abdul Rashid
Post Content:
Urgent hiring! Software International Corporation is hiring! Job Opportunity for local candidate!Vacancy: ğŸ”¹ Senior Quality Assurance Engineer* 2 headcounts availableWorking location: Kuala LumpurSenior Quality Assurance Engineer Key Responsibilities:1. Test Strategy & Planning:- Develop comprehensive test plans and strategies covering both manual and automated testing approaches.- Collaborate with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to define testing requirements and priorities.2. Automation Testing:- Design, develop, and maintain robust automation frameworks using industry-standard tools (e.g., Selenium, Appium, or similar).- Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines to ensure continuous quality and fast feedback.3. Manual Testing:- Execute detailed manual testing processes, including functional, regression, and exploratory testing.- Identify, document, and manage defects; perform root-cause analysis to ensure issues are resolved in a timely manner.4. Test Strategy & Planning:- Develop comprehensive test plans and strategies covering both manual and automated testing approaches.- Collaborate with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to define testing requirements and priorities.2. Automation Testing:- Design, develop, and maintain robust automation frameworks using industry-standard tools (e.g., Selenium, Appium, or similar).- Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines to ensure continuous quality and fast feedback.3. Manual Testing:- Execute detailed manual testing processes, including functional, regression, and exploratory testing.- Identify, document, and manage defects; perform root-cause analysis to ensure issues are resolved in a timely manner.4. Team Leadership & Training:- Monitor daily QA activities and provide guidance to junior testers.- Develop training materials and conduct regular training sessions to enhance team capabilities in both manual and automated testing practices.- Act as a mentor, sharing expertise and best practices to build a high-performing QA team.5. Continuous Improvement:- Stay updated on emerging trends and tools in test automation and manual testing.- Evaluate and recommend new testing tools and techniques to improve efficiency and effectiveness.- Collaborate in cross-functional teams to implement process improvements and quality enhancements.Requirements:* Minimum 8 years of experience in handling projects and with exposure to the full system development life cycle. Manual & automated testing for web, mobile & requirement testing would be advantageous.* Preferably with insurance knowledge/background.* Candidate with any programming or scripting knowledge will be an added advantage.* Possess at least a Degree in IT or equivalent.* Salary : RM10,000 - RM12,000* Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 8:30 AM to 5:30 PM* Hybrid Working Mode* Benefits: 18 days AL, Annual Performance Bonus, Company Activities Events, Team Building and TrainingHow to Apply: Email your CV to me at rashidah.rashid@perkeso.gov.myhashtag#vacancyhashtag#myfuturejobshashtag#petronashashtag#expetronashashtag#hiringhashtag#newhiringhashtag#currenthiringhashtag#urgenthiringhashtag#SeniorQualityAssuranceEngineerhashtag#jawatankosonghashtag#kekosonganjawatanhashtag#seniorengineer

Test Strategy & Planning:- Develop comprehensive test plans and strategies covering both manual and automated testing approaches.- Collaborate with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to define testing requirements and priorities.2. Automation Testing:- Design, develop, and maintain robust automation frameworks using industry-standard tools (e.g., Selenium, Appium, or similar).- Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines to ensure continuous quality and fast feedback.3. Continuous Improvement:- Stay updated on emerging trends and tools in test automation and manual testing.- Evaluate and recommend new testing tools and techniques to improve efficiency and effectiveness.- Collaborate in cross-functional teams to implement process improvements and quality enhancements.Requirements:* Minimum 8 years of experience in handling projects and with exposure to the full system development life cycle. Job Opportunity for local candidate!Vacancy: ğŸ”¹ Senior Quality Assurance Engineer* 2 headcounts availableWorking location: Kuala LumpurSenior Quality Assurance Engineer Key Responsibilities:1. Test Strategy & Planning:- Develop comprehensive test plans and strategies covering both manual and automated testing approaches.- Collaborate with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to define testing requirements and priorities.2. Automation Testing:- Design, develop, and maintain robust automation frameworks using industry-standard tools (e.g., Selenium, Appium, or similar).- Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines to ensure continuous quality and fast feedback.3. Manual Testing:- Execute detailed manual testing processes, including functional, regression, and exploratory testing.- Identify, document, and manage defects; perform root-cause analysis to ensure issues are resolved in a timely manner.4. Team Leadership & Training:- Monitor daily QA activities and provide guidance to junior testers.- Develop training materials and conduct regular training sessions to enhance team capabilities in both manual and automated testing practices.- Act as a mentor, sharing expertise and best practices to build a high-performing QA team.5. Continuous Improvement:- Stay updated on emerging trends and tools in test automation and manual testing.- Evaluate and recommend new testing tools and techniques to improve efficiency and effectiveness.- Collaborate in cross-functional teams to implement process improvements and quality enhancements.Requirements:* Minimum 8 years of experience in handling projects and with exposure to the full system development life cycle. Manual & automated testing for web, mobile & requirement testing would be advantageous.* Preferably with insurance knowledge/background.* Candidate with any programming or scripting knowledge will be an added advantage.* Possess at least a Degree in IT or equivalent.* Salary : RM10,000 - RM12,000* Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 8:30 AM to 5:30 PM* Hybrid Working Mode* Benefits: 18 days AL, Annual Performance Bonus, Company Activities Events, Team Building and TrainingHow to Apply: Email your CV to me at rashidah.rashid@perkeso.gov.myhashtag#vacancyhashtag#myfuturejobshashtag#petronashashtag#expetronashashtag#hiringhashtag#newhiringhashtag#currenthiringhashtag#urgenthiringhashtag#SeniorQualityAssuranceEngineerhashtag#jawatankosonghashtag#kekosonganjawatanhashtag#seniorengineer

Username: Nuur Rashidah Abdul RashidNuur Rashidah Abdul Rashid
Post Content:
Urgent hiring! Software International Corporation is hiring! Job Opportunity for local candidate!Vacancy: ğŸ”¹ Senior Quality Assurance Engineer* 2 headcounts availableWorking location: Kuala LumpurSenior Quality Assurance Engineer Key Responsibilities:1. Test Strategy & Planning:- Develop comprehensive test plans and strategies covering both manual and automated testing approaches.- Collaborate with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to define testing requirements and priorities.2. Automation Testing:- Design, develop, and maintain robust automation frameworks using industry-standard tools (e.g., Selenium, Appium, or similar).- Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines to ensure continuous quality and fast feedback.3. Manual Testing:- Execute detailed manual testing processes, including functional, regression, and exploratory testing.- Identify, document, and manage defects; perform root-cause analysis to ensure issues are resolved in a timely manner.4. Job Opportunity for local candidate!Vacancy: ğŸ”¹ Senior Quality Assurance Engineer* 2 headcounts availableWorking location: Kuala LumpurSenior Quality Assurance Engineer Key Responsibilities:1. Test Strategy & Planning:- Develop comprehensive test plans and strategies covering both manual and automated testing approaches.- Collaborate with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to define testing requirements and priorities.2. Automation Testing:- Design, develop, and maintain robust automation frameworks using industry-standard tools (e.g., Selenium, Appium, or similar).- Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines to ensure continuous quality and fast feedback.3. Manual Testing:- Execute detailed manual testing processes, including functional, regression, and exploratory testing.- Identify, document, and manage defects; perform root-cause analysis to ensure issues are resolved in a timely manner.4. Team Leadership & Training:- Monitor daily QA activities and provide guidance to junior testers.- Develop training materials and conduct regular training sessions to enhance team capabilities in both manual and automated testing practices.- Act as a mentor, sharing expertise and best practices to build a high-performing QA team.5. Continuous Improvement:- Stay updated on emerging trends and tools in test automation and manual testing.- Evaluate and recommend new testing tools and techniques to improve efficiency and effectiveness.- Collaborate in cross-functional teams to implement process improvements and quality enhancements.Requirements:* Minimum 8 years of experience in handling projects and with exposure to the full system development life cycle. Manual & automated testing for web, mobile & requirement testing would be advantageous.* Preferably with insurance knowledge/background.* Candidate with any programming or scripting knowledge will be an added advantage.* Possess at least a Degree in IT or equivalent.* Salary : RM10,000 - RM12,000* Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 8:30 AM to 5:30 PM* Hybrid Working Mode* Benefits: 18 days AL, Annual Performance Bonus, Company Activities Events, Team Building and TrainingHow to Apply: Email your CV to me at rashidah.rashid@perkeso.gov.myhashtag#vacancyhashtag#myfuturejobshashtag#petronashashtag#expetronashashtag#hiringhashtag#newhiringhashtag#currenthiringhashtag#urgenthiringhashtag#SeniorQualityAssuranceEngineerhashtag#jawatankosonghashtag#kekosonganjawatanhashtag#seniorengineer

Urgent hiring! Software International Corporation is hiring! Job Opportunity for local candidate!Vacancy: ğŸ”¹ Senior Quality Assurance Engineer* 2 headcounts availableWorking location: Kuala LumpurSenior Quality Assurance Engineer Key Responsibilities:1. Test Strategy & Planning:- Develop comprehensive test plans and strategies covering both manual and automated testing approaches.- Collaborate with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to define testing requirements and priorities.2. Automation Testing:- Design, develop, and maintain robust automation frameworks using industry-standard tools (e.g., Selenium, Appium, or similar).- Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines to ensure continuous quality and fast feedback.3. Manual Testing:- Execute detailed manual testing processes, including functional, regression, and exploratory testing.- Identify, document, and manage defects; perform root-cause analysis to ensure issues are resolved in a timely manner.4. Team Leadership & Training:- Monitor daily QA activities and provide guidance to junior testers.- Develop training materials and conduct regular training sessions to enhance team capabilities in both manual and automated testing practices.- Act as a mentor, sharing expertise and best practices to build a high-performing QA team.5. Continuous Improvement:- Stay updated on emerging trends and tools in test automation and manual testing.- Evaluate and recommend new testing tools and techniques to improve efficiency and effectiveness.- Collaborate in cross-functional teams to implement process improvements and quality enhancements.Requirements:* Minimum 8 years of experience in handling projects and with exposure to the full system development life cycle. Manual & automated testing for web, mobile & requirement testing would be advantageous.* Preferably with insurance knowledge/background.* Candidate with any programming or scripting knowledge will be an added advantage.* Possess at least a Degree in IT or equivalent.* Salary : RM10,000 - RM12,000* Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 8:30 AM to 5:30 PM* Hybrid Working Mode* Benefits: 18 days AL, Annual Performance Bonus, Company Activities Events, Team Building and TrainingHow to Apply: Email your CV to me at rashidah.rashid@perkeso.gov.myhashtag#vacancyhashtag#myfuturejobshashtag#petronashashtag#expetronashashtag#hiringhashtag#newhiringhashtag#currenthiringhashtag#urgenthiringhashtag#SeniorQualityAssuranceEngineerhashtag#jawatankosonghashtag#kekosonganjawatanhashtag#seniorengineer

Job Opportunity for local candidate!Vacancy: ğŸ”¹ Senior Quality Assurance Engineer* 2 headcounts availableWorking location: Kuala LumpurSenior Quality Assurance Engineer Key Responsibilities:1. Test Strategy & Planning:- Develop comprehensive test plans and strategies covering both manual and automated testing approaches.- Collaborate with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to define testing requirements and priorities.2. Automation Testing:- Design, develop, and maintain robust automation frameworks using industry-standard tools (e.g., Selenium, Appium, or similar).- Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines to ensure continuous quality and fast feedback.3. Manual Testing:- Execute detailed manual testing processes, including functional, regression, and exploratory testing.- Identify, document, and manage defects; perform root-cause analysis to ensure issues are resolved in a timely manner.4. Team Leadership & Training:- Monitor daily QA activities and provide guidance to junior testers.- Develop training materials and conduct regular training sessions to enhance team capabilities in both manual and automated testing practices.- Act as a mentor, sharing expertise and best practices to build a high-performing QA team.5. Continuous Improvement:- Stay updated on emerging trends and tools in test automation and manual testing.- Evaluate and recommend new testing tools and techniques to improve efficiency and effectiveness.- Collaborate in cross-functional teams to implement process improvements and quality enhancements.Requirements:* Minimum 8 years of experience in handling projects and with exposure to the full system development life cycle. Manual & automated testing for web, mobile & requirement testing would be advantageous.* Preferably with insurance knowledge/background.* Candidate with any programming or scripting knowledge will be an added advantage.* Possess at least a Degree in IT or equivalent.* Salary : RM10,000 - RM12,000* Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 8:30 AM to 5:30 PM* Hybrid Working Mode* Benefits: 18 days AL, Annual Performance Bonus, Company Activities Events, Team Building and TrainingHow to Apply: Email your CV to me at rashidah.rashid@perkeso.gov.myhashtag#vacancyhashtag#myfuturejobshashtag#petronashashtag#expetronashashtag#hiringhashtag#newhiringhashtag#currenthiringhashtag#urgenthiringhashtag#SeniorQualityAssuranceEngineerhashtag#jawatankosonghashtag#kekosonganjawatanhashtag#seniorengineer

Test Strategy & Planning:- Develop comprehensive test plans and strategies covering both manual and automated testing approaches.- Collaborate with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to define testing requirements and priorities.2. Automation Testing:- Design, develop, and maintain robust automation frameworks using industry-standard tools (e.g., Selenium, Appium, or similar).- Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines to ensure continuous quality and fast feedback.3. Continuous Improvement:- Stay updated on emerging trends and tools in test automation and manual testing.- Evaluate and recommend new testing tools and techniques to improve efficiency and effectiveness.- Collaborate in cross-functional teams to implement process improvements and quality enhancements.Requirements:* Minimum 8 years of experience in handling projects and with exposure to the full system development life cycle. Urgent hiring! Software International Corporation is hiring! Job Opportunity for local candidate!Vacancy: ğŸ”¹ Senior Quality Assurance Engineer* 2 headcounts availableWorking location: Kuala LumpurSenior Quality Assurance Engineer Key Responsibilities:1. Test Strategy & Planning:- Develop comprehensive test plans and strategies covering both manual and automated testing approaches.- Collaborate with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to define testing requirements and priorities.2. Automation Testing:- Design, develop, and maintain robust automation frameworks using industry-standard tools (e.g., Selenium, Appium, or similar).- Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines to ensure continuous quality and fast feedback.3. Manual Testing:- Execute detailed manual testing processes, including functional, regression, and exploratory testing.- Identify, document, and manage defects; perform root-cause analysis to ensure issues are resolved in a timely manner.4. Team Leadership & Training:- Monitor daily QA activities and provide guidance to junior testers.- Develop training materials and conduct regular training sessions to enhance team capabilities in both manual and automated testing practices.- Act as a mentor, sharing expertise and best practices to build a high-performing QA team.5. Continuous Improvement:- Stay updated on emerging trends and tools in test automation and manual testing.- Evaluate and recommend new testing tools and techniques to improve efficiency and effectiveness.- Collaborate in cross-functional teams to implement process improvements and quality enhancements.Requirements:* Minimum 8 years of experience in handling projects and with exposure to the full system development life cycle. Manual & automated testing for web, mobile & requirement testing would be advantageous.* Preferably with insurance knowledge/background.* Candidate with any programming or scripting knowledge will be an added advantage.* Possess at least a Degree in IT or equivalent.* Salary : RM10,000 - RM12,000* Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 8:30 AM to 5:30 PM* Hybrid Working Mode* Benefits: 18 days AL, Annual Performance Bonus, Company Activities Events, Team Building and TrainingHow to Apply: Email your CV to me at rashidah.rashid@perkeso.gov.myhashtag#vacancyhashtag#myfuturejobshashtag#petronashashtag#expetronashashtag#hiringhashtag#newhiringhashtag#currenthiringhashtag#urgenthiringhashtag#SeniorQualityAssuranceEngineerhashtag#jawatankosonghashtag#kekosonganjawatanhashtag#seniorengineer

Job Opportunity for local candidate!Vacancy: ğŸ”¹ Senior Quality Assurance Engineer* 2 headcounts availableWorking location: Kuala LumpurSenior Quality Assurance Engineer Key Responsibilities:1. Test Strategy & Planning:- Develop comprehensive test plans and strategies covering both manual and automated testing approaches.- Collaborate with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to define testing requirements and priorities.2. Automation Testing:- Design, develop, and maintain robust automation frameworks using industry-standard tools (e.g., Selenium, Appium, or similar).- Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines to ensure continuous quality and fast feedback.3. Manual Testing:- Execute detailed manual testing processes, including functional, regression, and exploratory testing.- Identify, document, and manage defects; perform root-cause analysis to ensure issues are resolved in a timely manner.4. Team Leadership & Training:- Monitor daily QA activities and provide guidance to junior testers.- Develop training materials and conduct regular training sessions to enhance team capabilities in both manual and automated testing practices.- Act as a mentor, sharing expertise and best practices to build a high-performing QA team.5. Continuous Improvement:- Stay updated on emerging trends and tools in test automation and manual testing.- Evaluate and recommend new testing tools and techniques to improve efficiency and effectiveness.- Collaborate in cross-functional teams to implement process improvements and quality enhancements.Requirements:* Minimum 8 years of experience in handling projects and with exposure to the full system development life cycle. Manual & automated testing for web, mobile & requirement testing would be advantageous.* Preferably with insurance knowledge/background.* Candidate with any programming or scripting knowledge will be an added advantage.* Possess at least a Degree in IT or equivalent.* Salary : RM10,000 - RM12,000* Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 8:30 AM to 5:30 PM* Hybrid Working Mode* Benefits: 18 days AL, Annual Performance Bonus, Company Activities Events, Team Building and TrainingHow to Apply: Email your CV to me at rashidah.rashid@perkeso.gov.myhashtag#vacancyhashtag#myfuturejobshashtag#petronashashtag#expetronashashtag#hiringhashtag#newhiringhashtag#currenthiringhashtag#urgenthiringhashtag#SeniorQualityAssuranceEngineerhashtag#jawatankosonghashtag#kekosonganjawatanhashtag#seniorengineer

Urgent hiring! Software International Corporation is hiring! Job Opportunity for local candidate!Vacancy: ğŸ”¹ Senior Quality Assurance Engineer* 2 headcounts availableWorking location: Kuala LumpurSenior Quality Assurance Engineer Key Responsibilities:1. Test Strategy & Planning:- Develop comprehensive test plans and strategies covering both manual and automated testing approaches.- Collaborate with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to define testing requirements and priorities.2. Automation Testing:- Design, develop, and maintain robust automation frameworks using industry-standard tools (e.g., Selenium, Appium, or similar).- Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines to ensure continuous quality and fast feedback.3. Manual Testing:- Execute detailed manual testing processes, including functional, regression, and exploratory testing.- Identify, document, and manage defects; perform root-cause analysis to ensure issues are resolved in a timely manner.4. Team Leadership & Training:- Monitor daily QA activities and provide guidance to junior testers.- Develop training materials and conduct regular training sessions to enhance team capabilities in both manual and automated testing practices.- Act as a mentor, sharing expertise and best practices to build a high-performing QA team.5. Continuous Improvement:- Stay updated on emerging trends and tools in test automation and manual testing.- Evaluate and recommend new testing tools and techniques to improve efficiency and effectiveness.- Collaborate in cross-functional teams to implement process improvements and quality enhancements.Requirements:* Minimum 8 years of experience in handling projects and with exposure to the full system development life cycle. Manual & automated testing for web, mobile & requirement testing would be advantageous.* Preferably with insurance knowledge/background.* Candidate with any programming or scripting knowledge will be an added advantage.* Possess at least a Degree in IT or equivalent.* Salary : RM10,000 - RM12,000* Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 8:30 AM to 5:30 PM* Hybrid Working Mode* Benefits: 18 days AL, Annual Performance Bonus, Company Activities Events, Team Building and TrainingHow to Apply: Email your CV to me at rashidah.rashid@perkeso.gov.myhashtag#vacancyhashtag#myfuturejobshashtag#petronashashtag#expetronashashtag#hiringhashtag#newhiringhashtag#currenthiringhashtag#urgenthiringhashtag#SeniorQualityAssuranceEngineerhashtag#jawatankosonghashtag#kekosonganjawatanhashtag#seniorengineer

hashtag#hiring Job Title: Quality Assurance and Analytics SpecialistDepartment: Data Engineering / AI Data ServicesLocation: GlobalReports to: VP of AI OpsContract: PermanentTravel Requirements: NoSalary: Open BudgetJOB SUMMARY / OVERVIEWThe Quality Assurance and Analytics Specialist establishes and maintains QA frameworks and analytical processes for Digital Services and Products related projects. By auditing and reporting on key quality metrics, this role drives continuous improvement efforts and ensures high-quality data outputs. In collaboration with cross-functional teams, the specialist will alsodevelop and deliver training programs to enhance annotation accuracy, quality standards, and best practices. Additionally, they implement feedback loops, provide ongoing coaching, and leverage BI tools to deliver actionable insights that optimize overall performance and efficiency.MAIN JOB REQUIREMENTSEducation and Specific Trainingâ€¢ Bachelorâ€™s degree in Data Analytics, Information Systems, or a related field.â€¢ Additional certification or coursework in quality assurance, data analytics, or BI reporting is beneficial.Work Experienceâ€¢ Minimum of 3 years of experience in quality assurance or data analytics, preferably in data annotation, localization, or content moderation settings.â€¢ Proven experience working with BI and data visualization platforms (e.g., Power BI, Tableau).Special Certifications (Non-Mandatory)â€¢ Certifications in Six Sigma, Lean, or other quality management methodologies are advantageous.REQUIRED SKILLSTechnical Skillsâ€¢ Proficiency in BI tools (Power BI, Tableau) for data visualization and KPI tracking.â€¢ Strong analytical ability and familiarity with SQL or similar querying languages.â€¢ Basic scripting (Python) for automating quality checks (preferred).â€¢ Understanding of QA frameworks, data governance, and continuous improvement practices.Qualified candidates are encouraged to send their CVs to joyce@gratitudeindia.com for consideration.
